ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Camp from hell...
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of the Kisch... I was camping the front two Lteths this morning before work, when I got a /t from one of the other two folks in the dungeon (oddly
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of the Kisch...

I was camping the front two Lteths this morning before work, when I got
a /t from one of the other two folks in the dungeon (oddly enough, the other
two folks had names that were almost identical, and they were hunting
together... dual accounts? You betcha.). He asked me what weapons I was
using (Thulian Blade and Obs shard), then told me to invis and come on down
to the area where the Captain used to spawn. I had forgotten all about the
blade and it's nifty properties. He invited me to group, pulled the gnollie
in question, layed the almighty smacketh-down (he was a maxxed druid) on
it, then told me to loot. After I looted the Kisch, he and his dwarf both
buffed the bejeezus outta me, then logged. Whotta guy!


-=B=-
25th and climbing
The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian <jeff@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, March 06, 2000 9:34 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Camp from hell...


>From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
>I got lucky... a guild member gave me mine Yk last week and on Friday the
>Kisch Der Pavz fell for me in Paw :-). Now I'm happily wield the Yk in the
>primary and the Kisch in the offhand. Big difference from my old claws and
>silvery war axe. Think the Yk camp is bad? The Tesch Val Dval'Nmak that
>drops the Kisch is a 2 hour spawn and his rare is the sword and he really
>doesn't have a common although he occasionally drops a crummy gold ring.
>I've been killing him twice to three times a night for almost 2 weeks. We
>got the comando raid down to a science to get in there, kill him and get
>back out. Great to have guild members that will drop what they are doing
to
>do a comando raid :-). Last monday he dropped a FS long sword instead of
>the Kisch. Imagine my disappointment at that!
>
>Taneran Dreamweaver
>Happy Bard of the 41st song
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Mike Roach <Mike.Roach@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 8:29 AM
>Subject: [eqbards] Camp from hell...
>
>
>> From: Mike Roach <Mike.Roach@...>
>>
>> How in the world to people obtain Ykeshas these days? I heard they used
>to
>> drop a lot more often but this is absurd. Yesterday I logged on at 11am
>CST
>> in lguk and joined a Savant group, sent a tell to the list holder of the
>> Lord group and started killing frogs. I was finally called for my turn
in
>> the Lord group at 6pm CST, 7 hours later. Shortly after I arrived one of
>> the people ahead of me on the list fell asleep after an 18 hour camp and
>the
>> guy after him got a Yak.
>>
>> The group changed a couple times in the next hour so by 8pm I was on the
>top
>> of the list for a Yak, 2 hours after joining the group. We then camped
>the
>> room and I finally gave up with no Yak (5 SSB's) at 2:30am, 7 and a half
>> hours and no Yak. By the time I left I was the only original group
member
>> left.
>>
>> Meanwhile people continue to berate me for wielding a staff of writhing
at
>> 42nd level. What's a bard to do, has it always been this tough of a
camp?
>> This is totally absurd.
>>
>> -Faras
>>
>>
